trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示所有的基类<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event to respond when the user clicks a ButtonBase.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件，当用户单击 ButtonBase 时进行响应。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或时，按 ENTER 或空格键在控件有焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按空格键后，控制集<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>到`true`和捕获鼠标。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>等的鼠标事件

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或 enter 键不会更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>或捕获鼠标，但它确实增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> attached property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 集<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>附加到属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 集<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ButtonBase is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: ButtonBase 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>单击。

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the Click event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过使用提升的 Click 事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或时，按 ENTER 或空格键在控件有焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按空格键后，控制集<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>到`true`和捕获鼠标。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>等的鼠标事件

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the Click event.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或 enter 键不会更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>或捕获鼠标，但它确实增加 Click 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method and raises the Click event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>为在已处理的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>方法和引发单击事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Hence, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> event will never occur for a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>事件将永远不会发生从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>继承的控件</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 相反，将附加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>事件，或者调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |路由策略 |冒泡 | |委托 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event corresponds to a left mouse button click.
trans-unit.target: 此事件对应于按钮单击鼠标左键。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在按下此按钮时调用的命令。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于将命令与特定按钮实例相关联。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，此属性通常设置为其中一个现有的命令库，如<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands></xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>静态命令值

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)或<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandName* The command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*commandName*命令要在按下此按钮时调用。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 要在按下此按钮时调用命令。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要传递给参数<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter.
trans-unit.target: 大多数命令库中的现有命令不使用命令参数。

trans-unit.source: Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string.
trans-unit.target: 命令参数中使用的命令，其中的大部分携带某些基元类型值，如整数或字符串中添加参数。

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它是可以创建自定义命令，该命令需要为其命令参数的非基元类型。

trans-unit.source: For a custom command case like this, setting CommandParameter in code might require a new or existing object instance.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义命令这种情况下，代码中设置 CommandParameter 可能需要一个新的或现有的对象实例。

trans-unit.source: Setting CommandParameter in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command.
trans-unit.target: 在标记中设置 CommandParameter 可能要求的属性元素语法，其中填充属性元素语法对象元素都需要该命令的类型的新元素。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: 此外，在标记中的设置可能需要通过标记扩展对现有对象的引用 (使用进行这些引用通常[绑定标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)或[否则标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandParameter* A value of the same type as the particular command specified in the property expects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*commandParameter*中指定的特定命令作为相同类型的值属性所需。

trans-unit.source: If you use an existing command library command, see that command library's documentation for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, including which type of CommandParameter the command expects.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用现有命令库命令，请参阅该命令库的文档[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况信息，包括哪种类型的 CommandParameter 命令需要。

trans-unit.source: If you use a custom command, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用自定义命令，请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给参数<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the routed <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识路由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要对其引发指定的命令的元素。

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property cannot be used to define a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: CommandTarget 属性不能用于定义一种<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property provides a reference to an element that is already defined somewhere in your application.
trans-unit.target: CommandTarget 属性提供对已在你的应用程序中某一位置定义的元素的引用。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *elementName* The name of that receives the command.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*elementName*的名称接收命令。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Element on which to raise a command.
trans-unit.target: 要对其引发命令的元素。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你选择重写此实现，请确保调用基方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已启用该控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is currently activated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref>当前处于激活状态。

trans-unit.source: IsPressed is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed 是按钮，该值指示鼠标左键的状态，或到按钮上方按空格键。

trans-unit.source: When IsPressed is `true`, the control captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed 时`true`，该控件会捕获鼠标。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>等的鼠标事件

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change IsPressed or capture the mouse, but is does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>或 enter 键不会更改 IsPressed 或捕获鼠标，但的确能引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsPressed has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，IsPressed 具有的受保护的资源库。

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is activated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref>激活; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for this control is called.
trans-unit.target: 响应时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>此控件称为。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A> is `true`, this method calls the base implementation, which gives this control focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>是`true`，此方法调用基实现，它会显示此控件的焦点。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 时调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: The data for <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 数据<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>用户按下某个键，此控件具有焦点时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and one of the following cases are true: - The user presses the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>和以下情况之一为真:-用户按空格键。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: - The user presses ENTER and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> is `true` for this control.
trans-unit.target: -在用户按 ENTER 和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>是`true`对于此控件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件数据。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>用户释放某个键，此控件具有焦点时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user releases the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`当用户释放空格键。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>事件数据。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Called when an element loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 当在元素丢失键盘焦点时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref>时发生此控件不再接收鼠标事件消息的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event data.
trans-unit.target: 此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>事件数据。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> routed event that occurs when the mouse enters this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>鼠标进入此控件时发生的路由的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>，此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`并引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse leaves an element.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>鼠标离开元素时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>鼠标指针位于此控件下按下鼠标左键时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要响应<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，将附加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>事件，或者调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>，此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>当鼠标指针位于此控件用户释放鼠标左键时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要响应<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件，将附加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp>事件，或者调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>是`true`，此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>鼠标指针移到此元素上时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要响应<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件，将附加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove>事件，或者调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Called when the rendered size of a control changes.
trans-unit.target: 控件的呈现的大小更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the OnRenderSizeChanged method of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> OnRenderSizeChanged 方法

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size changes.
trans-unit.target: 指定的大小更改。
